title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms aids students with step-by-step solutions for quiz questions
description: With Copilot in Forms quizzes, teachers can easily generate step-by-step solutions for each question. Teachers have the option to allow students to immediately view their results so they can see what they've mastered and where they need further studying using the step-by-step solutions supported by Copilot.
